title: Everything you will ever need to type in league of legends to avoid getting banned
body:
Simple list of words and phrases that you can adhere to to avoid getting banned.

GLHF
Warded
Ward here
Pinked
Sweep here
[Champion] ult time?
[Indicate seconds till ult]
[Champion] no ult
[Champion] no [summoner spell]
Free Drag
Free Baron
Smitevicious plz
Focus [Champion]
GJ
U2
Recalling/Backing
Build [Item]
Buying [Item]
Invade
GG
GG WP


It's not a hard game, just stick to simple communication and you won't get banned.
